full_summary:
#### Stage 2 - Panikpak Window Replacement, Aulavik National Park
#####
  ##### Solicitation Number: 5P468-23-0236/B
  #####

**Notice Type and Method**: Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Category**: Construction Services - Commercial and Office Building Construction Services

**Contracting Authority**: Parks Canada

**Scope of Work**: Parks Canada is seeking a contractor to replace 16 windows for the Parks Canada/Hamlet Panikpak Office building located in Sachs Harbour, Northwest Territories. The scope of work includes window replacement, patching and repairing of interior walls, and repainting of affected areas.

**Drawings and Specifications**: Refer to the drawings and specifications for detailed information on the project requirements.

**Contact Information**:

* John Umuerri, [john.u_elementry@pc.gc.ca](mailto:john.u_elementry@pc.gc.ca), 431-335-6240

**Stage Process**: This posting is part of a two-stage solicitation process. Stage 1 evaluated the qualifications of all interested suppliers, while Stage 2 invites qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project. Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.

**Tender Closing Date**: March 7, 2024, 16:00:00

**Expected Contract Start Date**: March 11, 2024

**Expected Contract End Date**: October 31, 2024

**Trade Agreements**: This solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions of Opportunity**: Canada

**Regions of Delivery**: Northwest Territories

**Notice Disclaimer**: This solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number 5P468-23-0236/A dated December 14, 2023, with a closing of January 16, 2024. A debriefing session will be provided upon request to bidders who bid on the previous solicitation. let me know if you want any adjustments. 
```
